creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. H. M. Fredrikson
description: rectangular panel, central body white and unadorned; supplimentary weft patterning of red bands at each end, additional band of diamonds in purple, green and orange; end with more embroidery has a triange which terminates banding and points into body of towel
medium: Linen, wool, silk, cotton; supplementary weft patterning; needlework
title: Bride's Gift Towel
